mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.pro_no as proNo , t.pro_alias as proAlias , t.pro_name as proName , t.bean_name as beanName , t.interface_url as interfaceUrl , t.account as account , t.encrypt_pwd as encryptPwd , t.salt as salt , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.status as status , t.usable_num as usableNum , t.alarm_threshold as alarmThreshold , t.sort as sort , t.create_time as createTime , t.create_by as createBy , t.update_time as updateTime , t.update_by as updateBy , t.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_sms_service_provider
id,
pro_no,
pro_alias,
pro_name,
bean_name,
interface_url,
account,
encrypt_pwd,
salt,
tenant_id,
status,
usable_num,
alarm_threshold,
sort,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
remark,
#{id},
#{proNo},
#{proAlias},
#{proName},
#{beanName},
#{interfaceUrl},
#{account},
#{encryptPwd},
#{salt},
#{tenantId},
#{status},
#{usableNum},
#{alarmThreshold},
#{sort},
#{createTime},
#{createBy},
#{updateTime},
#{updateBy},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
update t_sys_sms_service_provider
pro_no = #{proNo},
pro_alias = #{proAlias},
pro_name = #{proName},
bean_name = #{beanName},
interface_url = #{interfaceUrl},
account = #{account},
encrypt_pwd = #{encryptPwd},
salt = #{salt},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
status = #{status},
usable_num = #{usableNum},
alarm_threshold = #{alarmThreshold},
sort = #{sort},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_sys_sms_service_provider t where t.id=#{id}
select from t_sys_sms_service_provider t where t.pro_no = #{proNo} and t.status = 1
